scripts.dev: pkill -f 'fluopanel' || true; lsof -ti:1420 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; concurrently -n libs,tauri,vue -c blue,yellow,green "npm run dev:libs" "npm run dev:tauri" "npm run dev:vue"
scripts.dev:libs: concurrently -n core,providers "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:providers"
scripts.build: npm run build:vue && npm run build:tauri
scripts.build:libs: npm run build -w fluopanel-core && npm run build -w fluopanel-providers
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
